document_data.mainbody:
exilanthus was a young, male copper dragon that lived in the Savage Frontier during the late 15 century DR.
One day while flying lazily in circles over his domain, a group of adventurers caught the attention of Vexilanthus. While conversing with him the adventurers mentioned that they were on the lookout for giants. Vexilanthus informed the group that recently some hill giant had been prowling around a decrepit old tower, somewhere in the hills After pointing the adventurers in the direction of the tower, Vexilanthus offered to escort them to the nearest settlement for a fee of 500 or more gold pieces.
